001.comments: If this section if FULL or BLOCKED please sign up for the corresponding wait list section - THTR 456, Section WL1. Once you have registered in the wait list there is no need to contact the Department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available. Preference may be given to Majors, Minors, or Honours students in Theatre or Film. For more information about Department of Theatre and Film wait lists please visit: http://theatrefilm.ubc.ca/undergraduate/undergraduate-courses/how-to-wait-list-a-course/

S11.comments: This is a mandatory studio section for THTR 456, Section 001. You must be registered in the main section in order to enrol in the studio section.

WL1.comments: This is a WAITLIST section for THTR 456, Section 001. Once you have registered in the wait list there is no need to contact the Department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available. Preference may be given to Majors, Minors, or Honours students in Theatre or Film. For more information about Department of Theatre and Film wait lists please visit: http://theatrefilm.ubc.ca/undergraduate/undergraduate-courses/how-to-wait-list-a-course/

description: Pattern development and cutting for costume for stage and screen using flat pattern and draping.
